One of her children died more than 20 years ago, and the cause of death is unknown. She thinks that ordinary people have a hard time and have no hope in life. She won't come back in the next life. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1882456951961079808/pu/img/aXTDt1EAfgRoQJVW.jpg

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Recently, Chen Cong, CEO of Dongqiudi, published a real-name report on an online platform, exposing a series of problems his company encountered in trademark disputes.
Chen Cong pointed out that after the judicial auction of Dongqiudi's trademark was revoked, Xiamen Aobo's attorneys You Yunting and Mei Yifeng were accused of misinterpreting the court's ruling and even fabricating the judge's remarks, misleading the app market to remove Dongqiudi App and obstructing its restoration on Apple's App Store.
In addition, the Xiamen Siming District Court froze Dongqiudi's assets when handling a defamation lawsuit, although the case lacked substantial evidence of damage. Chen Cong questioned whether the court had fully reviewed the property preservation process and said that he would apply for reconsideration in accordance with the law.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, Shanghai Shaanxi Coal High-tech Research Institute Co., Ltd., a third-level wholly-owned subsidiary of Shaanxi Coal Group, illegally forced employees to reduce their salaries.
At the end of the year, employees were forced to sign an agreement to adjust the original fixed-floating ratio of 8:2 to 4:6, which was a disguised salary reduction of 60%. The monthly meal supply was also cancelled and the meal money was included in the performance share. Employees complained that "if the performance is not good, you don't deserve to eat." https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GiADsOHXQAAlhIT.jpg

Everyone agreed that the new progress and new achievements made in the court work in the past year are fundamentally due to the leadership of General Secretary Xi Jinping and the scientific guidance of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GiAK1DgaQAAEaAM.png

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
A Xiaohongshu netizen posted his pay slip and called on the Chinese people to pay attention to the low-income people in China.
"Recently, friends from all over the world have joined Xiaohongshu, and the Chinese people are full of sympathy. Suddenly, they feel that the American people are living in dire straits. In fact, there are more low-income people in China... I work in a state-owned enterprise in Zixing, Hunan, and my monthly salary is only about 1,600 yuan. When Chinese people pay attention to the living conditions of foreign friends, they should pay more attention to the low-income people in China." https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GiAUakEW0AAuQVC.png

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On January 24, Dr. Xia Zhimin published an article stating that multiple bioavailability data in the consistency evaluation of generic drugs by the State Drug Administration are identical.
For example, rosuvastatin calcium tablets, the original drug is produced by AstraZeneca, with the trade name "Calve", a total of 12 specifications have passed the consistency evaluation, and the bioequivalence study results of Nanjing Zhengda Tianqing and Lek Pharmaceuticals d.d are exactly the same.
It is very difficult and the requirements are very high for a generic drug to pass the consistency evaluation formally. There are 6,000-7,000 pharmaceutical companies in my country, tens of thousands of generic drugs, and only 1,988 specifications have passed the consistency evaluation so far. In addition to passing the quality standard test of the laboratory, it is also necessary to verify its bioequivalence in human trials. And these verification methods and processes, regardless of the United States and Japan, are basically international practices.
Then, such a serious bioequivalence study has appeared on a large scale...

On November 19, 24, Hainan. Mr. Cheng, holding his ID card, reported in his name that Xiao Feng, secretary of the Political and Legal Committee of Lingshui County, destroyed his family and had an improper relationship with his lover for a long time, and posted several screenshots of explicit chats between his wife and Xiao Feng.
Mr. Cheng said that in addition to Xiao Feng's violations of discipline in his lifestyle, he also had more serious violations such as bribery and even money laundering.
On January 22, the official announcement: Xiao Feng has been expelled from the party and removed from office. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1882740991054295040/pu/img/4LjBE6ONBaHQAD2y.jpg

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On January 23, the U.S. Congress formally proposed the "Restoring Trade Fairness Act" to revoke China's permanent normal trade relations. It is a bipartisan bill jointly proposed by Republican and Democratic lawmakers. The new bill creates a new tariff category for China: a minimum ad valorem tariff of 35% (based on the proportion of the estimated value of the goods or transactions) is imposed on non-strategic goods, and a minimum ad valorem tariff of 100% is imposed on all strategic goods. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GiDlrqEagAA0JkD.jpg

The Kremlin believes that Russia has successfully withstood the sanctions. name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Ministry of Finance: In 2024, the national general public budget revenue was 21970.2 billion yuan, an increase of 1.3% over the previous year.
Among them, the national tax revenue was 17497.2 billion yuan, a decrease of 3.4% over the previous year;
Personal income tax was 1452.2 billion yuan, a decrease of 1.7% over the previous year.
Non-tax revenue was 4473.0 billion yuan, an increase of 25.4% over the previous year.
Stamp tax was 342.7 billion yuan, a decrease of 9.5% over the previous year. Among them, the stamp tax on securities transactions was 127.6 billion yuan, a decrease of 29.1% over the previous year.
In 24, the national general public budget expenditure was 28461.2 billion yuan, an increase of 3.6% over the previous year. The income from the transfer of state-owned land use rights was 4869.9 billion yuan, a decrease of 16% over the previous year.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Bloomberg reveals that BYD's actual net debt is 323 billion yuan, and supply chain financing has become an "invisible bomb"
According to a report by Bloomberg on the 20th, GMT Research, a short-selling agency in Hong Kong, China, which once predicted the debt problems of real estate company Evergrande Group, pointed out that BYD seems to be addicted to supply chain financing, and its trend is worth paying attention to.
GMT released a report on the 10th of this month showing that if the accounts receivable removed from the balance sheet due to sales or borrowing are re-included in the calculation, and the accounts payable with a term of more than 90 days are adjusted to debt, BYD's net debt was as high as 323 billion yuan as of the end of June last year. The official net debt for the same period last year is only 27.7 billion yuan. In this regard, BYD refused to comment.
GMT analyst Nigel Stevenson pointed out that no matter what the structure is, this is obviously a way to finance or hide debt...

The merchant then posted that the platform blocked the post on the grounds that the content misled readers and was suspected of defamation. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GiEReNia4AAwFfp.jpg

content: A doctor posted on WeChat Moments that a passenger suddenly fainted in the aisle on a plane to Portugal, and he kindly helped the passenger. As a result, when he got off the plane, the crew asked him to show his medical certificate. A passenger next to him said, "No medical staff will dare to help you if you do this." In the end, he left his address and mobile phone number before he was allowed to get off the plane. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GiEXrwpbIAAGtyl.jpg

content:
On January 23, a "wall-hanging brother" posted on Tieba that he was forced to go to a shelter by the police because he could not find a job and slept under a bridge. The shelter bought him a ticket home and sent a security guard to follow him until he got on the bus to prevent him from escaping.
He said that not only did he not find a job, but he was also sent back home. He went to the village committee to ask for food, but was driven away by the security guard. "Does it mean that I really have no choice but to die?" https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GiEdgRtaEAALiOf.jpg

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: A doctor posted on his WeChat Moments that a passenger suddenly fainted in the aisle of a plane to Portugal, and he kindly tried to help the passenger. However, when he was getting off the plane, the crew asked him to show his medical certificate. A passenger nearby spoke up and said, "No medical staff will dare to help after this." In the end, he was allowed to get off the plane only after leaving his address and mobile phone number.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On January 23, a "wall-hanging guy" posted on a forum that he was forced to go to a shelter because he couldn't find a job and had to sleep under a bridge. The shelter bought him a ticket home and sent a security guard to follow him until he got on the bus to prevent him from escaping. He said that not only did he not find a job, but he was also sent back home. He went to the village committee to ask for food, but was driven away by the security guard. "Does it mean that I really have no choice but to die?"
